post.body: No, there are quite a few jews on #TCOT And glad to have you. :)
#tcot The best page for listening to talk radio online: http://bit.ly/Axo6
Got you :D
RT Please check out http://www.tcotreport.com . Current info, and is a "draft" of a possible new #TCOT main page
Btw, I am not jealous. Im just a hardcore fiscal conservative.
@ccwriter I am not against them making more money. Truly. It is the timing. Now is not the time to spend more.
@michellemalkin Bailouts will not end now. We are on a Bailout train to hell.
@DerekTrovi @ccwriter Remember most of their expenses are taken care of as well.
@DerekTrovi @ccwriter I honestly have to say, most americans would be estatic with 169k per yer. http://bit.ly/Caul
Judges are truly a dif argument. I agree with you on that one.
They are compensated in many other ways, mamy of those continue after their term is over. Speaking engagements, Board spots, etc
They are not there to make money? Right? They are there to serve? A CEO is hired not elected? You serve for the people? NOT $$?
I disagree. Most are independently wealthy (not all), and most of their expenses are cared for. Plus voting this raise now...
Wait, does that mean you agree with congress giving itself a raise in a time of econmic turmoil? Clarify please.
Bailout is now a 4 letter word? #tcot
I also voted for McCain, even though I had issues with some of his policies. Why would EITHER refute my moral ground?
That makes absolutely no sense. a) Conservatives have been calling Bush out FOR YEARS. Fiscally hes horrible.
Was that a serious statement??? REALLY? Given one mans faults we can not question the other mans? FACEPALM
I have to stop watching them. I am going to give myself an ulcer watching these: http://bit.ly/ofZH
Same back at you Diva. Be safe, and have fun.
ROFLMAO "Gore-Tex"
That made me proud to be a Texan.
I don't normally block anyone, but that statement is earning you a block.
Listening to Glenn Beck as I attempt to get back to work. He is talking global warming.
RT @Bodhi1 #tcot The best page for listening to talk radio online: http://bit.ly/Axo6
Even with the purge I am edging closer to 600 followers. TY #TCOT TY @michaelpleahy for #TCOT
